comments.content: To the people who can't just compliment a natural gift without the 'put down' critical comment thrown in...really?!  1. She's only 13.  2. She's a natural.  ... See More
I didn't understand the song, but the way she sang it and delivers, Oh my...it  made me cry  :(  I so admire her.....Good luck and God bless you Laura!!!

I have seen this performance a few times before and every time I watch and listen to it, I end up with tears in my eyes. Why? I cannot explain but I am so happy for that young girl. Amazing gift/talent.

Ray Hughes ... just wondering where I can see you in concert or buy your albums (maybe just send me a voice mail of your obvious talent because I seem to have missed your stellar career). Can't wait for you to shine, shine, shine. Dick.

This RAY character acts like an uneducated pompous prick so any of you arguing with him is like arguing with a child. And the way he cusses, he shouldn't be allowed in public. And I don't care if you don't like what I wrote, Ray!!! Have a great day!!!
I love Opera this young lady just made me cry what a voice she has, she is going to go far never heard anything like this from a 13 year old girl, God bless you you sing like an angel.

she's only 13, but her voice sounds like a 30yo, how gifted she is, and that's true, her dreams will come true.wow!, unbelievable, how beautiful voice she has, congratulation laura, hope, someday, ypu'll be singing here in Manila, bye
I have never been really big on opera but this young lady was freaking awesome. Everytime i listen to her sing this song i get goose bumps and tears in my eyes.

This is the first time I  have  ever said "Wow!" aloud to my phone. Let's pray that this child gets the training/mentorship she needs to bless the world with her amazing talent without losing her humility.

Oh dear i think ray is winding people up, he obviously knows NOTHING about music. This wee girl has a future, lovely voice for someone so young

You Ray are a complete ass... There was nothing mediocre about that performance , she has one hell of a future ahead of her with that voice.. If you think you could do a better job at singing please do post a video. I'm sure it would be absolutely dreadful....

This is wrong on so many levels. Keep this up and she will have no singing voice by the time she is 16. And why sing a tenor aria? The words were not there either. A traditional American song would have suited her so much better. There is no doubt she can sing, but her vocal chords must be protected at all costs.

I,m more of a Heavy Metal fan .... but ..... I am not ashamed to say that there was more than a tear or two watching this. In fact there was a serious shortage of tissues. Brilliant talent, good luck to her.
Oh my goodness!  This girl's life is changed forever!  DON'T MISS HEARING THIS!  God has surely blessed her with a magnificent voice!  Only 13 years old!  Be prepared to be blown away!!

First note I thought, " this is what she's singing?" But wow!!!! She brought tears to my eyes. She has a terrific talent that will improve as she grows and develops. As far as public being fooled...they are the ones who pay and attend performances and purchase music...they are the ones who decide wether or not someone has future career. Ray sounds like a bitter green eyed monster

I can not understand how this beautiful child  did not win this competition. Americans you don't know talent when you see or hear it; most disappointed by your choice .of the winner although cute 'she hasn't the talent of this girl
Beautiful voice from such a darling young girl so sweet I just want to give her a hug and wish her well& great success!  ðŸ‘ðŸ»  You rock young lady!!

We actually watched her when she sang that song and the entire season. What a fantastic singer she is. She will go far in the music Business....Most Adults can not sing anywhere near how great that young Lady is and for them to knock her singing, Well they need to get their tails up on that stage and show the world how big a fool they are...Would pay to watch her sing....I sure would.
Laura was absolutely FANTASTIC....I watched her all the way through the shows, and she never let me down....what a talented young lady with a fabulous voice...Loved all of her performances.
Absolutely awesome. That is the only word comes to mind and oh she made me cry from joy to hear this fantastic voice from such a young girl. She definitele has a huge future in store for her.
Simon should be given an Oscar for his performance on all these talent competitions it is so false I don't know why people can't see this he knows exactly who is going to perform and what

I see Ray Hughes is from Australia. To me that explains his comments perfectly. What do expect from people with their heritage. We exported his criminal ancestors years ago. I would be embarrassed to display my heritage. You moron.
I quit smoking 26 years ago so I could sing "oh holy night " at Christmas mass but it didn't work. I still can't carry a tune. This young girl is WONDERFUL. I hope she wins and goes far.
no clue the message of the song she sang but my goodness, I've got ghost bumps and tears, she made me cry, good luck to you Laura, you are already a winner, God bless to your future  ðŸ’¯ ðŸ‘ âœ¨

Don't care what you say Gary, she has the most wonderful talent. Good luck to her for the future. I am sure it will be everything she wishes for.

The little girl has obviously yet to learn to phrase properly, but that will come with voice training, BUT ... she has an absolutely amazing voice, and with the right guidance she could be one of the world's great singers. Close your eyes and she's 35 years old. It's a long hard path singing classical music and she has to have the will and stamina to get there, I wish her well

I don't normally watch such shows but Declan wanted it recorded so I set the PVR to catch them all.  This young lady continued to produce amazing performances as did so many others.  And what's even better was the ability of Declan and  Camden  to not only enjoy but appreciate the talent that was showcased.

I am so pleased to see her genuine and humble joy in being able to sing from her heart.  I too love to sing and remember singing in grade school...being told to "tone it down" and to sing "quietly".  Those comments made me feel that I could not sing well.  I sang from my heart and I enjoyed singing.  I remember singing because singing made me feel good, whether it was good or not...it gave felt good.
Shit given she is not trained only 13 my god does she have one hell of a future...very very few people on this planet can pull of that song....and she did.... Pavarotti would be proud

This was absolutely amazing.  I don't care which musical genre you feel drawn to, this is one of the best young voices ever heard. My goodness, what a vocal range. I can only wish the best for the fantastic future before her.

I find her talent just so amazing, and just as well i am sharing this to my batch mates,  retired 2Star General benjie magalong and fellow gymnast in high school General willie franco. You guys are just amazing.

On June 3, 2016  Laura won Romanii Au Talent, Romaniaâ€™s version of the show. She acted as though she had never sang in front of a huge crowd before, acting all shy. but, she does have a great voice.

Laura Bretan is a young lady gifted with a strong and pliable vocal chord!  She sounds angelic with that Aria song!   (y)  I wish she wins the 1Million dollar prize.  She's very unassuming and modest girl.

This is the toughest competition I have ever witnessed. This lady gave me goose bumps. But she's up against another 14 yr old that is just as amazing to hear. There are at least 6 acts that are just splendid.

Only just heard this  <3  she in an incredible young lady and i had goosebumps .Wishing her all the best in whatever the future brings , but i predict great things for her , love and best wishes from the UK  <3

Personally don't like the sound of her voice. Nothing against her personally. I think all female opera singers should try to sound more like Jackie Evancho. The tone that resonates is so much easier on the ear than this.

An amazing young voice, but curious as to why the tape editor jumbled up all the lyrics to Nessun Dorma, would have done her more justice to leave the recording uncut , as the editor obviously didn't know the aria

She IS a natural. She HAS a lot of potential. She needs coaching. She is 13. In the words of the immortal BB King: "you can't play the blues until you have had them." Having said all of that, she's great

This young lady should have won the competition - I was amazed that she stood with the-face at the end and was knocked out and he almost took the prize. Can't believe the American voters. This child is really talented and should go far. I enjoyed watching the whole show while I was in Dallas this year.
The sad thing is Simon knew exactly who she was, she had won yugoslavia's got talent the year before or whatever country and they thought it would be good to see how far she got in the USA.

She must travel a lot this is the third time I have seen this from three different countries. However if this child can sing like this she has a wonderful future ahead of her and on the Phillipines got talent said she had never had a lesson.
I know less than nothing about opera but I'll tell you, that brought tears to my eyes.  God bless this child and I hope her voice brings that special feeling to millions of others.

description: Wayne Challeen Comment from another thread. About why Berners really donâ€™t care or think the FB ads from Russia matter much. Sheâ€™s right on.  I think it's because Sanders supporters saw actual rigging. We saw actual voters disenfranchised. Actual voter fraud. Actual election fraud coming from members of our own party. We saw Bill Clinton stumping illegally IN an election place. Actual millions paid into CTR for internet trolling with misinformation. Actual lies about our candidate on the news only to discover these were all deliberate. We saw collusion between party leaders and the media to a degree we didn't realize existsed, and like you said, it always has. But knowing those things threw our election makes it so that the Russian interference seems to pale in comparison. In fact, the general election was a fraud to start considering the cheating in the primary. And lastly, our DNC members and the media colluded in such a way as to deliberately elevate Trump so that Clinton had less competition and we know that.  ~ Dawn Noelle Richard Piltz
